vista.time
Interface Time

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultTime
public interface Time
extends java.io.Serializable

An interface to a time object.

Version:
$Id: Time.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:36 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu

compare

Parameters:
time - the time object to which this is compared to.
Returns:

Parameters:

ti - the time interval by which current time will be incremented by.
Returns:

ceiling

Time ceiling(TimeInterval ti)
rounds time to nearest nice interval >= current time and returns a new time with value

floor

Time floor(TimeInterval ti)
rounds time to nearest nice interval =< current time and returns a new time with value

round

Time round(TimeInterval ti)
rounds time to nearest nice interval. If exactly in middle it rounds to ceiling.
